website_summaries.verdict: Consists of a ball, base, 15-pound resistance bands, and glossy instruction poster.
pros: The heavy-duty ball is available in 2 sizes, so you can choose the correct size for your height and weight
Great quality, and the company’s customer service is excellent
cons: Some issues with the base not inflating enough to hold the ball in place

customer_reviews.title: It works just like promised
customer_reviews.text: I was anxiously awaiting this product to add to my home gym, and as a seat, and I must say, I am pleased. I've only had it a couple of days and already worked out with and now I'm sitting on it as I type this review. I have been having issues with my low back, and I wanted to try something different. But so far, so good. Pray things only improve from here. Millie
customer_reviews.author: Millicent Roy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Office Chair/Ball
customer_reviews.text: It takes a long time to blow up, the pump provided is absurdly cheap and wheezy, but once inflated it is stable and surprisingly comfortable. I have used as my office chair all week, and my back and neck are less sore and achy. While it is somewhat of a myth that these balls will improve your "core strength," what they do is force you to keep your head straight above your shoulders, in the proper posture. The 75 cm size, with the ring, makes it more usable in an office setting, keeps the ball from rolling away when not in use. Others in my office have tried and are getting their own.
customer_reviews.author: GoCubs

customer_reviews.title: Quite a purchase for the price!
customer_reviews.text: If you follow the instructions, you should inflate the ball to full size in two increments of time. And I am doing that, because I want sooo badly for this product to be as great as it appears. I was pleasantly surprised to see all of the accoutrements that came with this product as well as the quality, considering the reasonable price. I need something for stretching and strengthening my back/core in a gentle way, and I believe this will work. Once I have completed the inflation process as instructed, I will write a secondary review. Looking forward to using this!
customer_reviews.author: DeepFushcia

customer_reviews.title: LOVE the stability!
customer_reviews.text: I like the stability of this product. I had an exercise ball that was given to me, but I didn't use it much. I would have just purchased the base and resistance bands, but for the price, having a new ball that was more my size was better. I feel more confident doing exercises on this. I love the large poster that comes with it with easy visual references categorized by target area. It makes working out so much simpler. Great idea and awesome product.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen W.

customer_reviews.title: Quality at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I wound up ordering a second one. I use one as an alternate desk chair at work. The ball is larger than others I've had, which provides a great height to be used at my desk. The base/ring, still allows for enough movement to engage my core, without the worry of losing my balance and falling off at work, which would be embarrassing to say the least. I also do a few exercises on my lunch break. I ordered another for home. I'm 5'6" and my son is 5'10" we both love the size of the ball. The entire set up looks very expensive, and like it will last. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dianna Thurman

customer_reviews.title: The base started leaking air after a month; when ...
customer_reviews.text: The base started leaking air after a month; when I started to re-inflate it the biggest part of the base popped. It had just started to get firm and was still below the right circumference so i know it wasn't user error. I hope that the ball itself doesn't start to lose air, I'm not sure I would want to risk re-inflating it.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel L.

customer_reviews.title: I love the size and quality of the ball itself
customer_reviews.text: This 2 issues I have with this set is 1. The ball doesn't exactly fit in the floor support so it moves quite a bit. 2 The floor support is inflatable so it moves when using the resistance bands. I love the size and quality of the ball itself, as well as the exercise chart!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: and that is a super challenging workout
customer_reviews.text: I am a member of Orange Theory Fitness, and that is a super challenging workout. I am having trouble with strength issues and thought this ball and using the bands might help me. It's to soon to tell yet, but I hope going to Orange Theory and using this ball will get me where I want to be. The ball is well made, the bands have good resistance and the air pump worked fine. I would recommend this product. I have had no customer service issues, but I have been sent emails by this company making sure I was satisfied with my product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: I would give zero stars if I could. I have bought several brands in the past and none of them bursted. My oldest child was a colicky baby and I lived on a yoga ball. This (almost new) ball bursted last night while my husband was holding our fussy newborn. It was so scary. Avoid injuries: do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: Maria P. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Better off just buying a workout ball for less money
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this. The ball is ok (a little cheap) my ball came with a weird dip in it where there is less rubber, I am sure it's gonna pop. The base is ok. But the straps to work out on just don't stay on, they are kind of useless.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Horrible!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give a negative star I would. Worst yoga ball and stand ever. The stand is so ineffective, I could have just stuck with the yoga ball I have and figured something out. No matter how much or how little the ball is inflated it does not fit in the ring, so there is no stability at all. I spend so much time trying not to roll around I get nothing done. The list of exercises provided are pitiful, one can google more exercises than what was provided. Going to return this item as fast as I can. What a waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: stephmg

customer_reviews.title: Product ordered not in the box
customer_reviews.text: Just received my order... Ball, base, inflation tape measure and pump are not in the box. The only items in the box are the bands set, and wall poster. So basically I received... Nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Michele W.

customer_reviews.title: Good price for set, customer service awesome
customer_reviews.text: This set comes at a great price, and is very versatile. The ball is good quality, and the resistance bands are nice. The stability ring was really wonky, so I contacted Mantra Sports, and they shipped me a new one right away. The second was a little off, too, having some air bubbles, but I requested that they not send me another replacement since it was really just cosmetic. Their customer service was great, they were very fast with their responses, and they went above and beyond to make sure I was happy with my order. I definitely recommend Mantra!
customer_reviews.author: christy

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Was a little hesitant in buying, but am totally happy with the exercise ball, ring and resistant bands. It's sturdy, easily put together, and allows a great workout. I recommend to anyone who really wants to workout at home. If one does not workout regularly at a gym, I would suggest starting slowly until your body gets adjusted to it. Do every other day or two days. You can do in front of television. Have done on carpet, as well as hard wood floor. Very stable.
customer_reviews.author: KATRINA NOLDER

customer_reviews.title: Missing foot pump
customer_reviews.text: There was no foot pump in this package. Even though the box clearly states it should have a foot pump in there... Now I have to go buy a pump in order to inflate. Revised: The Amazon seller Mantra Sports was kind enough to give a partial refund since I had to go out and buy a pump. The actual ball, ring, and resistance bands are of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Toy

customer_reviews.title: Better luck next time
customer_reviews.text: I want to say that I absolutely love this product and I did in the beginning. I received the chart with the exercises and the ring with resistance bands but I had the ball less than a month, and even though it says Antiburst, it somehow got damaged being at my desk and leaked out all of the air. My husband has a different brand ball at his desk as well and had the same abuse as mine and his ball is still going strong. I missed my opportunity to return it and have decided not to order this specific one again. Better luck next time. Still a good product and everything included is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Very useful set for light workouts
customer_reviews.text: Very useful set for light workouts. Packaging was very good. Nice poster showing all the exercises that can be done with the set. Only issue was with all the pieces (nozzles) that came in the box -- no instructions on how or where to use them. There were 2 long nozzles and 1 short, and there was a little wrench-looking tool that I never figured out how/where to use. Did get everything inflated through trial & error and have been able to use the set since then, but maybe put a description of how/where to use these various pieces when inflating.
customer_reviews.author: rosetully

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous - Base does NOT work.
customer_reviews.text: DANGEROUS! The ball flips right over the base. I was doing one of the exercises listed and the ball rolled back and threw me off, causing me to hit my head on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Quite Literate

customer_reviews.title: Not good, Returning
customer_reviews.text: The exercise ball was inflated, measured, and then fully inflated per enclosed instructions. It all looked good and I was excited to get it but the exercise ball appears to be very thin and collapses too much when you sit on it. It goes down so much that you can't maintain proper posture to perform the exercises on the insert.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy of 2

customer_reviews.title: Ball is sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Just starting using the bands and the band broke. Ball is sturdy though. I was contacted right away and they sent me a replacement. So far so good. Great customer service
customer_reviews.author: Shan

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Stability ball and ring
customer_reviews.text: So far, I really like this stability ball! Right now I'm using it primarily as a seat and it is fantastic! The ring that comes with it makes it possible to use comfortably this way. I have another stability ball but this one is so much better for me because it is bigger and that ring is integral for it being superior to my other ball. I deflated my old one and packed it away. I do high intensity workouts and sitting on this, instead of a chair really allows for my muscles to relax and I can even get deeper stretches! You know what? I don't like it, I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Snm

customer_reviews.title: Received today box damaged
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to get the item. Received today and box was damaged, open on side there is missing parts. No measure tape, pins, pin removal tool. Not sure what else is missing from package. I’ll have to return what’s there, I’ll re review once item is received in working condition
customer_reviews.author: Tru

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new body ball! As I'm suffering from ab separation from my 10 month old who was born c section weighing 10 lbs, I've had such difficulty being able to get back to working out without experiencing pain. Now I'm able to stretch and workout with ease thanks to the support from my new body ball! Thank you for creating this product with it's New additions!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: I’m obsessed with this ball!!!
customer_reviews.text: OMG!!! I LOVE this ball!!! Three years after back surgery, I still have problems with low back pain and bursitis in my hip. I bought this set for core strengthening, but this ball is so much more!! Just sitting on this ball relieves so much back and hip pain! After a long day in the office, coming home and just sitting on this ball helps so much! It also helps to arch my back fully! I love, love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Becca Franks

customer_reviews.title: Great Concept and Product
customer_reviews.text: My wife recommended I check this out, and we're both thrilled with the quality of the ball and associated items. It is made of a dense and durable vinyl. We bought two in the last year - the 65cm is just right for my wife and the 75cm, is the perfect size for me (I'm 6' tall). We use this daily to maintain core strength and balance. Trying new exercises is like testing a new espresso maker...you can only so so much at a time, so...good workout. Every time!
customer_reviews.author: Dan in NC

customer_reviews.title: Bad back
customer_reviews.text: I got this ball for physical therapy. I'm glad I chose this one. I'm 5'10" and was able to choose the right size for myself. Everything else that comes with it is an added bonus. Set up is easy. The products are tough. I love that it comes with resistance bands. They're great quality too. Even the exercise poster is nice. I never thought I'd post it up, but I did right away. Working on my back feels much safer with the stabilizing ring. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: Worth the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Love this ball so far. Only feedback is the resistance bands aren't as sturdy as I'm used to with other products, just some getting used to I guess. Also, I love the fact that they give you exercise techniques but CMON on a huge poster board instead of making it into a DVD or even make a better YouTube channel for purchased customers. Just saying. Final thoughts, it's worth the investment dont get me wrong it's just not all products are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as hoped
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea of the ring to hold the ball in place and the bands to work the arms. Unfortunately I am disappointed in it. First the pump that comes with it is crap. Just throw it away and use another. Even with an electric pump the ball was hard to inflate. Was unable to keep the ball fully inflated before getting the stopper in. Then it is really hard to get the stopper out. The ball was very soft which for me, made it difficult to do the exercises. Overall I would not recommend this particular ball.
customer_reviews.author: nethop

customer_reviews.title: More than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I love this trio! I followed the set up instructions to the letter. I began using the ball and following the plan on a Monday at 5am. I've been alternating between upper lower and core with a day in between. I felt results immediately. Great purchase; great addition to my workout regimen. Still using free weights in addition, but the ball has dramatically improved my core and I'm loving it. Wish we had met sooner!
customer_reviews.author: JPRD

customer_reviews.title: I bought this one for work. Now I want one for home. I think I'm going to ditch the recliner!
customer_reviews.text: I took this ball to work. Got rid of my uncomfortable hard ergonomically incorrect chair. My back is already feeling better and stronger. I recently had a bad cold and was stuck in my recliner for about 4 days. Well surprise, my back went out. I was in so much pain and I couldn't sit on a regular chair at all. But yesterday I stood for 3 hours at a little work station I created and then I spent the rest of day on the ball stretching and gently moving. And just the one day there's been a great Improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Review Update
customer_reviews.text: My daughter purchased this ball to help me with my sciatica pain to allow to try to exercise. I am due for a knee replacement and at baseline can be a little unsteady on my weight. This ball, even with the stability base, did not work well for me at all. I fell off several times. I don't believe it was a weight issue or even a manufacturer problem- but just that this particular work out device isn't a good for me. So my recommendation- if you are steady and can balance, maybe this would work for u. I would not recommend this for anyone who has balance issues.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Rolan

customer_reviews.title: I wish there was a 3.5 rating
customer_reviews.text: Everything came timely and in one package. I had issues with inflating the ball and tube. I don't know how anyone properly inflated the ball with the included foot pump. I had to get our electronic air pump to get the ball to 65 cm, even after properly following the procedures for inflating. I don't know exactly what the stand is for other than to attach the resistance bands. It does not keep the ball stable. I do like the ball. It is more squishy than the Gaiam ball I sit on for my "desk chair" which makes it more unstable, but that also means I work my core more trying to maintain balance.
customer_reviews.author: Ramona Underwood

customer_reviews.title: Only 55 cm
customer_reviews.text: Not as advertised. It's 55cm not 65. They insist I'm not blowing it up enough. I've owned about 5 of these things
customer_reviews.author: DEBBIE DEAN

customer_reviews.title: Handles Broke after 3 days, ball is super thin material
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my husband and the handles broke after 3 days and the 75cm ball is really huge and is made of a super thin material. I will take pictures of the handles and post this evening when I am packaging it all up to send back. I bought a different set for myself from So Alpha and compared to that product this one is by far a cheaper version. The pump is super cheesy and hard to use as well. I would not recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Lynette Carlson-Evans

customer_reviews.title: Yogi Ball!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful workout ball! I've owned my fair share of these balls, but never one of this quality. It is made of a thick material, so you know it's quality, and it doesn't leak whatsoever. I've been using it as well as my 275 lb workout fanatic husband and even he likes it...I didn't initially receive the workout poster, so I emailed the seller and within minutes I received a response and apology and it was made right that very moment...I couldn't be more pleased!
customer_reviews.author: AmberTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The ball I received does not blow up to 65cm. It can only blow up to just over 55cm. If I blow it up to the 65cm it will probably pop if I put weight on it. The ball is very tight at the way I have blown up now. I would not buy it again because I felt it would be bigger plus it doesnt fit tight in the ring it is a blow up ring also. I will use it as I paid for it but I would go with the bigger ball since this one isnt really 65cm
customer_reviews.author: kristie

customer_reviews.title: Great exercise ball
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great!!! Pumped it up half way with my air mattress compressor. The rest of the way by foot pump that was included. IDK about all the bands and work out items honestly. The ball is great and I stretch and exercise with it. Also, the orange circle it comes with to hold the ball is amazing, It doesn't roll around and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: YogiMM

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your workout buck!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best thing I have purchased in a long time! It’s so easy to set up and so fun to use. I absolutely love the easy-to-folllow poster that shows all the different exercises and what area of the body that position works. And I love the color!! Great product, super friendly customer service staff, and the price just can’t be beat for something this amazing. I’m feeling results already!
customer_reviews.author: Ty's Family

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 75cm ball, and it is very durable. Good quality material. The company emailed me to thank me, with an intro, and a preview of the workout poster. The ball was a workout to pump up itself haha :) if you have an electric pump, it might make it faster, but its doable. The company has also emailed to check in. I am a big girl and I feel very stable and supported by this brand of exercise ball. Very impressed
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Lesesne

customer_reviews.title: Just No
customer_reviews.text: This ball has not and will not inflate! The base is just another balloon and everytime I inflate and try to place the stopper, it rapidly deflates and keeps NO air whatsoever. The ball material is stuck together as if it's been in storage too long and won't unbend. It has spots where the material is worn from being folded all that time. I wanted to like this but it's been two weeks of trying and I can't get it to even hold air. I can't even put it back in the box - off to recycle bin it goes.
customer_reviews.author: Nell-J

customer_reviews.title: You can work your entire body!
customer_reviews.text: When you can’t get to the gym, you’ll love this! I use to work out in gym for years. We used these in aerobic classes. And the poster they send with all kinds of exercise is so helpful. My daughter uses also and loves it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy S.

customer_reviews.title: Check it as soon as it arrives!
customer_reviews.text: Was unable to contact the seller in time to let them know the ring has a leak around the opening. I ordered this item and then my husband went into the hospital for a month so I just unpacked the items this week and aired up the ball and ring. The ring will not hold air so I can’t use it or the bands that attach to it. I’m very disappointed because otherwise the item is exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Randall

customer_reviews.title: Lots of options for and exercise ball
customer_reviews.text: I have never purchased an exercise ball before but always wanted one. I came across this and love the fact it was a full body workout and had the ring to help stabilize the ball. Being new at this that is very much needed. Blowing up the ball with the air pump was a workout in it self but when it was done I was happy with the quality. I work from home a lot and this will be good to sit on during those long conference calls. Good purchase I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cherri Sheler

customer_reviews.title: Good, but less than 65 cm in the end
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that this has a stabilization ring and resistance cords but I ordered a 65 cm and I could not get it to that size. I even used our electric pump, inflated for a few days, and came back to try to inflate it more. It did stretch a little more, but it did not get to the size it is supposed to. Besides that it's a nice ball, and very sturdy. I wish they had it in pink, but you get what they offer. I can always get a pink ball from somewhere else as a replacement, if it really bugs me.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara A. Leffert

customer_reviews.title: Great and has resistance bands.
customer_reviews.text: This company makes a really nice stability ball. I really like the extras that come with it like the stand and resistance bands that come with it. I do recommend getting a electric inflatables machine to blow it most of the way. The pump that comes with it will give you a workout blowing up the ball. Other than that very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: This whole set is way worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Love this ball and the accessories, along with the bonus poster with exercises. We bought this to ease back pain after long days of work. It is amazing how much it helps receive back aches and also is the perfect size for exercising. The poster gives great ideas on how to use it for all parts of the body and the stability base is so helpful. We love this product and the whole family uses it. I've taken to using it as my chair at the desk and my back never gets sore anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Vance Family

customer_reviews.title: Great home gym, great price
customer_reviews.text: Not only is this a great option for a home workout system (I actually bought it for my husband to rehab his shoulder after rotator cuff repair), it is easy to set up and easy to use. I had a small issue when I first received it (a leak in the stabilization ring), but the customer service department went ABOVE AND BEYOND to make it right. They responded immediately, and replaced it super fast. Highly recommend this system!
customer_reviews.author: Lynne Cook

customer_reviews.title: Straps  not useable
customer_reviews.text: Ball is fine. The straps are my complaint. They are WAY to long to be useable. I’m 5’8 and my arms are fairly long. I can’t imagine anyone using them. The video suggests wrapping them around the stabilizer ring. This is stupid. I tied knots into them to shorten them. That just did not work out. They became too hard to flex. had to purchase additional straps to make it work.
customer_reviews.author: amazoncustomer5

customer_reviews.title: Good value for your money here
customer_reviews.text: I’m loving this setup. The ball is 75cm around, took a few minutes to inflate and they do include a tape measure strip so you can measure the circumference. I would suggest pumping the base up slowly and watch for bulging, don’t make it too tight. The elastic arm bands hook up easy and work well since you can move them around the base to whatever location you need for that particular exercise. It’s also great for just sitting and bouncing watching tv 👍
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Needs a companion wheeled base
customer_reviews.text: DISLIKE: Mantra does not offer a chair base for the ball. Upon contacting Mantra, I was told to look into Gaiam chairs, but I had already rejected Gaiam and other brands because of bad reviews. I have a lot of back and hip pain when sitting on most chairs, and I should preface my review by explaining that I bought this ball to use as a desk chair, not for exercise. It is not easy to use with the stability ring when at the desk kneehole. I am presently using the ball without the ring. A wheeled base would be enormously helpful. LIKE: Lifetime gruarantee, anti burst, strong material, stability ring, good reviews, .
customer_reviews.author: carol

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product and am super happy that I bought it. I recently purchased a Kindle book (Cure Tight Hips Anywhere by Sean Schniederjan) to help rehab a sore hip and the leg exercises on the poster are just what I need to be doing. This is definitely going to be a new favorite for my leg days. The poster provides a full-body workout. It's a great new addition to my home gym.
customer_reviews.author: HS

customer_reviews.title: Great for sitting 1 foot off the ground
customer_reviews.text: We purchased for my 6’6 husband who needs the passive stability for his long hours at the computer. We did a test drive at home and no matter how much we filled it The ball would flatten out to a comical amount... I tried it as well to see if it was a weight issue and I went flat down to the ground. A big disappointment!
customer_reviews.author: TKBostick

customer_reviews.title: Great Ball
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite ball of 3 that I bought. I didn't think I'd use the bands but they are actually great. The pictures pointed out exercises I forgot about or have not used in a while. The ball is sturdy and I prefer this type of traction over the lines around the ball. Very easy to inflate with the foot pump too. And anyone who uses this properly knows the incredible benefits of using a ball. Highly recommend it. The best size I think is 65 as 75 was too big.
customer_reviews.author: William Farr

customer_reviews.title: More benefits than anticipated
customer_reviews.text: I have replaced my office chair with this exercise ball. It keeps me moving while I sit all day. I use the exercise bands when I am on a call that does not require me to talk or type. My posture has been corrected and that has relieved the chronic neck pain I have suffered with for more than 10 years. I would recommend this item to anyone who wants to get more movement in their day without needing to take extra time out of their day to work out.
customer_reviews.author: RBascue

customer_reviews.title: Great value, came on time!
customer_reviews.text: Came on time. I still need to inflate and set it up, which I am excited for. All parts are accounted for. I have guests in from out of town so I will set it up when less chaotic!! Hopefully soon!! Will update review after. I mostly got this to use as a chair and also start work to strengthen my core for the health of my bad back. For all this is possible of doing it was a great value!!! Also knowing it is antitrust & can hold me is peace of mind!
customer_reviews.author: Angiemickey72

customer_reviews.title: ... service provided by this seller (Mantra Sports) was beyond amazing! The product arrived with a minor defect in ...
customer_reviews.text: The customer service provided by this seller (Mantra Sports) was beyond amazing! The product arrived with a minor defect in the ring, I contacted the seller and I received a personal response right away. The entire set was replaced immediately and painlessly! The replacement set is perfect with no defects! I use the exercise ball for working at my desk and simply for exercising/stretching! Its a great deal, great every day tool and the excellent customer service really makes it worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany L

customer_reviews.title: More of a beach ball than exercise ball
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this ball and couldn’t wait to receive it to begin exercises my chiropractor recommended for pain. When I opened the box and took out the deflated ball, I was concerned that it looked a lot smaller than it should be. I laboriously pumped the ball up only to realize it’s dull inflated size was more like a beach ball than what is shown in the pictures. I’m 5’5 - average weight-and my knees were almost touching the floor when I sat on it - fully inflated. So disappointed. The hand pump was difficult to use and made noises that my dogs found particularly disturbing. Sending this back.
customer_reviews.author: MamaLlama

customer_reviews.title: Buy it already!
customer_reviews.text: Great design, a wonderful addition to my growing collection of home exercise equipment. The resistance bands, and base allow me to seamlessly interchange from one muscle group to another. The workouts on the poster are a great starting point. My favorite is the wall squat with the ball between me and the wall, with some weight added via dumbells my legs are getting a challenge. Don't hesitate.... Hit that add to cart button, and the rest is history.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Pain to pump up
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a work office chair. It is very stable and I like it. But my butt gets numb if I'm sitting too long though, not the balls fault. I haven't used the bands yet. I'm waiting a little while to get used to sitting on it. I wish I have brought my foot pump from home when I was ready to blow up. It was too awkward to pump by my self and needed a coworker to help.
customer_reviews.author: Aimeeintx

customer_reviews.title: The stability ring had a big bubble
customer_reviews.text: The first impression was good. Seems to be good material and well written instructions. I filled them by the book, first day only inflated it as described and fully inflated it 24 hours later. However the ring developed immediately a big bubble compromising the stability. I did not returned it because I only used it 6 months later when I had time to use it. Waste of money for me.
customer_reviews.author: Leif Ebert

customer_reviews.title: I have had severe injuries and bad back so my PT said to substitute this for ...
customer_reviews.text: As of yet, I can't use all the the arm exercise equipment that came with it which I believe is a real plus. I primarily use it as a chair substitute several times a day. I have had severe injuries and bad back so my PT said to substitute this for my chair several times a day. It is very high quality and I really like the stabilizer. I'm looking forward to the help this will give me. It looks like it's going to last a VERY long time. I'd highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: I might just be too heavy...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a desk chair after my doctor recommended it for my damaged tailbone. It's a great ball but the recommendation for my desk wasn't great. I'm 5'4" 230lbs and got 65, it sat a little low. I still use it but would have gone one size larger for a desk chair.if you are thinner it would probably work great .
customer_reviews.author: MyraM

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts and previously opened.
customer_reviews.text: Missing parts AND there were crumbs on the ball. Clearly someone had opened it and used it. I’m missing the extra plugs and measuring tape.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia A Elkins

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Originally I had a one star review because I received the wrong color ball and size, HOWEVER Amazon never fails and you redeemed yourselves my loves! Thank you so much, I literally put in my replacement order request yesterday and got the correct item today! It’s perfect!! Thank you so much, I am one happy camper! The 65cm set is awesome!!! Thank you again Amazon for making it right, from the bottom of my heart I truly appreciate it!!!
customer_reviews.author: RiaPants0715

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: The ring didn't keep it in place at all. Don't bother inflating with the pump that it comes with unless that's how you intend to work out.
customer_reviews.author: S. Tassin

customer_reviews.title: The rubber this is made of is very soft
customer_reviews.text: I bought this ball mostly to sit on in the office. I've tried other exercise balls at work and loved them. I could tell immediately that this ball was made of a different, very strange rubber. I tried it anyways and I was in excruciating pain by the end of the day. I think the rubber is just too soft or something and doesn't provide very much support.
customer_reviews.author: JAR

customer_reviews.title: The product that I purchased (Complete Home System) is a good quality product
customer_reviews.text: Most impressed with Mantra Customer Service. You ask, they get back to you quickly, this is important in order to have a successful business and customer satisfaction. The product that I purchased (Complete Home System) is a good quality product. Being a mature person I did purchase an electric pump (Amazon) which made inflating the ball much easier. My doctor suggested I use the ball for exercise and so far it is good. The instructions are great to use and easy to follow. Very happy with Company and product.
customer_reviews.author: jetmmm

customer_reviews.title: I just loved it! Really complete!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just loved it! Really complete!!! They fact that it comes with a base for the handles and the poster with lots of exercises categorized already by the body area you'll be working on... it gives you tons of ideas to get to workout even when you're not in the mood of working out! There's no excuse! Besides, the base helps you be organized; the ball is not on the way rolling around the room. You can use it as a seat you can easily balance on! Enjoy!!!
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Love this addition to my home gym
customer_reviews.text: I've seen others much higher prices and I promise this one gives everything they do for less money. It took a while to pump it up and set it up, but once I did, it's great!! It did not come with the poster though, which makes me sad, but all in all it's a great product.
customer_reviews.author: CDB

customer_reviews.title: Ball is great, the stability ring isn't as good material as the ball.
customer_reviews.text: Husband had to use an electric air blower to fully inflate the ball. He was able to use the inflater included to blow up the ring, (material is thinner than the ball), but it got a knot/bubble in it before fully inflated. It's worked ok so far, but might have a get another ring long before I get another ball.
customer_reviews.author: C Wagnor

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money on this .
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to inflate but very hard to totally deflate it never gets enuff air in it to b totally firm This ball is too small for someone of 5'11 as it is advertised. I'm 5'5 and it was too small for me and the cords were way too long. Overall I rate this a 3. The pump worked pretty good for awhile pumping air into it but it would not inflate the stability base at all and it would not deflate the ball or the base. Had to buy an electric pump to finish pumping both the ball and the stability base, Which neither one got firm enuff to really workout on it safely.
customer_reviews.author: Dark&Lovely

customer_reviews.title: Met/exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.text: Stability ball arrived with everything it was supposed to. Pumping the ball up took awhile, however it is more exercise. Now that many of us are working for home, the ball and ring have become the office chair. Customer service is great. The original had a hole poked in it, and they replaced it. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: J. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Defective but good customer service
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product blew it up, which took some time and I ended up using an automatic pump instead of the manual pump provided. I used the ball twice and on my third time to go use it the ball was pretty flat, so thinking that maybe the ball had deflated due to the fact I just turned the heat on in my house, I blew it up again and went back to use it again the following day and the ball was flat again. It is unable to hold any sort of air and I am not sure why. I reached out to the company and they were great about sending me out a brand new ball!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: The product is not the highest quality, but it works as advertised. The ball is difficult to inflate because the pump that comes with the is extremely cheap. The poster describes the exercises fairly well. I would recommend this product as a good addition to an exercise program
customer_reviews.author: Bullen Family

customer_reviews.title: USE TO CONTINUE PHYSICAL THERAPY AFTER TOTAL SHOULDER REPLACEMENT
customer_reviews.text: I am still under MD care but can use the BodyBall with limited use. The bungee straps are fantastic and the ball is very stable inside the ring!!! When I am finally released, I will continue the use of my BodyBall to build up my strength again. My PT thinks it is a great item and something that they are sure will help my recovery at home. KG
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen A. Guillen

customer_reviews.title: Quality and durability are most important.
customer_reviews.text: The ball and accessories came well packaged. Instructions for inflation were simple to follow. The ball material requires temperature acclimation. You need to inflate partially then wait 24 hours to inflate remainder so don’t expect to use it immediately. Quality of ball and accessories is very good. I am very satisfied so far.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Smith

customer_reviews.title: Rubber bands break easily, Be gentle!
customer_reviews.text: After 1month of normal use as directed, the band completely snapped in half. To make matters worse, it broke exactly one day after the return policy expired so now I'm stuck with just one band and no way to contact the company. Don't buy this product if you want to use it for moderate exercise and expect a fair return policy. Amazon should have better standards for their products. Not worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Eric Talbot

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service to replace a broken band
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this ball over a year ago and it has been great. I haven't used the bands until the pandemic though and was disappointed that one broke after a few weeks of using them. I reached out to the company seeing what I could do about it. Customer service was very nice and easy to deal with. They quickly sent me out a replacement that is working fine. I am very pleased with the product as well as the customer service behind the scenes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to inflate. My 7 year old enjoyed helping me inflate it with the foot pump that comes with it. It is made of durable material. I have been using this about a week with and doing stretches with it. It is has helped my lower back pain quite a bit with extended and stretching all those muscles. I also enjoy using this at my desk as my chair while I work to help with my posture. I would purchase this again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Stull

customer_reviews.title: Great! Can be used in various ways.
customer_reviews.text: Great exercise ball and chair. I've used this as a chair for my desk and its given me no problems. I would say that the ball is huge... but overall when using it for exercises, it gives benefits to strengthening my back and correcting my posture. Great stationary exercise ball. Very, very secure
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Reyes

customer_reviews.title: I love using bucci balls and have wanted one at home ...
customer_reviews.text: I love using bucci balls and have wanted one at home for years and finally found the perfect one for me. It doubles as a desk chair for me, hopefully improving my core strength. Easy to inflate, great poster of exercises to put on your wall. Quality is excellent and the price is right.
customer_reviews.author: doglover

customer_reviews.title: Does not hold air.
customer_reviews.text: Pro — Once inflated, it performs well. Cons — Loses air, have to add air every 3 to 4 days. Pump that was provided continually comes apart and does very little for airing of this ball. ( It’s a good thing I have a supplemental air supply, and even this took a while).
customer_reviews.author: Larry E Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Quality is poor
customer_reviews.text: Collapses too much when you sit on it.Does not help you maintain stability. I have inflated it several times and the more I sit on it the more it stretches out like a balloon. Feels like it keeps stretching. I will be returning
customer_reviews.author: isaiahmom1

customer_reviews.title: Great Ball
customer_reviews.text: Received the ball and everything was great except it was the wrong sized ball. I contacted them and they were able to send out the right sized ball right away. I have given them 5 stars because their customer service was excellent and quick. I bought the ball mainly to use at my desk. I’ve noticed a huge difference in the way I sit. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: P. Hiss

customer_reviews.title: I feel the quality of the ball and accessories are great - but I’m just very disappointed in the wrong ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 75 cm ball - my issue is that the ball that arrived was marked as 75 cm but in reality it is a 65 cm sized ball. I am returning the ball for this reason alone. I feel the quality of the ball and accessories are great - but I’m just very disappointed in the wrong sizing and marking, I feel this is truly misleading. I am 6’2 and pregnant so it was imperative for the ball to be the correct size. If I was a small height, this set would have been perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Spend more to get a better quality
customer_reviews.text: I had to get a new one after the first week of using. The resistance bands broke. No, it wasnt from over use or pulling too hard. I used it once did about 5 reps and it snapped. Right now in my second ball I'm having the same issue but this time it's slow. But now I think I will have to awnd this one back
customer_reviews.author: Jonnii

customer_reviews.title: Everyone should have this in their life!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the biggest ball and gas no idea what size I SHOULD of bought. My bad!!! But in the positive side I am tall so can still safely reach the ground. I have learned how to balance I’m getting better every day helps my stomach and my back pain 😊
customer_reviews.author: Tonia

customer_reviews.title: Quick Tip
customer_reviews.text: I just used the product for the first time and the only complaint I have is that the tip of the screw that controls the tension came off multiple times while trying to adjust for each exercise and got stuck inside the chamber. Easy fix: find a relatively small Hex Key or Allen Wrench, tighten the band as best you can and, using the smaller end of the key/wrench, "J' that into the chamber from the opposite end and that tip will pop right out. Other than that, I did enjoy my first work out!
customer_reviews.author: Justin Boykin

customer_reviews.title: Weird stretch marks all over ball?
customer_reviews.text: Updated review: Nathalie contacted me as soon as she could and replaced my damaged exercise ball. The new ball is perfect with no weird stretch marks on it. I really appreciate the owner's quick customer service & dedication to quality. _________ I like the exercise ball, resistance bands, and exercise poster, but I am really concerned about these weird stretch marks all over the ball. Is my ball defective? Is it supposed to look this way? The marks are only visible in certain lighting conditions. Could the owner please reach out to me?
customer_reviews.author: Salma

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Better to buy from store, this is a waste of space and the energy spent blowing up is not worth it. Stick to the gym you can get a better work out.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Great for home workout
customer_reviews.text: Since my gym is closed due to Covid-19, this is a great multi-function workout for home. Stretching is a great stress relief, the stability ring really is helpful and love the resistance bands. Also, the workout guide is super helpful.
customer_reviews.author: book addict

customer_reviews.title: It would be easier to blow it up with a straw!
customer_reviews.text: The "pump" provided with the exercise ball is so flimsy that its worthless. The ball itself is also made of a very thin material and I imagine it popping right under me every time I sit on it. Wish I could return it but Amazon's window for returns has closed. Ugh.
customer_reviews.author: Kmorrison

customer_reviews.title: Quality Ball, but bring your own pump...
customer_reviews.text: The ball and the ring are made from durable high quality materials and I have no doubt in my mind that this ball is going to last for a very long time. I have not yet had a chance to try out the resistance bands but they too seem to be durable. The pump that came with this package was not able to finish the job. I ended up using a bike pump to get the ball and ring fully inflated. The pump fell apart mid stroke like my ex. It was a bit of a mess. But once I got the ball inflated, all was well.
customer_reviews.author: EOD2007

customer_reviews.title: No base
customer_reviews.text: My order came in on time. I received everything, except for the base. That was one of the main reason why I had purchased it. I was going to use this at my office. Im so bummed. I emailed the company directly, but no response. I guess I'm supposed to buy the base separately????
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price for great equipment!!
customer_reviews.text: Love my Bodyball! I'm actually using it at work as my chair for work and it is a wonder!! The ring keeps it in place and I love stabilizing myself on the ball! It keeps me focused and alert all day long!!! I researched the price as well and I couldn't find a better price anywhere!!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Kasprzak

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff.
customer_reviews.text: Looks just like the picture but the darker version. Not sure why theres a more silver color there which is the one i wanted, but that's okay. Pretty sturdy, comes with the pump which is a mini work out in itself to pump and fill. Short and easy instructions, blue to inflate, red to deflate. Fill up the base well so the resistance bands have a steady grip to them. Good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: noelia mars

customer_reviews.title: Fun easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Easy to use. I have only been using it for a few days and have enjoyed it so far. Hopefully this will help me to continue being motivated to work out. I love it cause I can use it while at home and while watching tv instead of sitting on the couch.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: broke in 10 days!!
customer_reviews.text: I never really write reviews, but I am sad to state that after having this product for only 9 days, today the resistance band snapped during exercise. The snap was so loud and the band smacked the side of the ball, thankfully it did not hit me as that would have been very painful! I would also like to note that I am a 5'7 145lbs female that normally chest presses about 45lbs, so I can't imagine that it was my own fault at pulling it to hard...
customer_reviews.author: Madeline D

customer_reviews.title: Not what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: I got the largest one and it didn’t inflate anywhere near what it said it would even after following the directions to wait 24 hours between inflating it again I don’t know if the wrong ball got in the wrong box but I wish I had inflated it before throwing the box away, I would have sent it back
customer_reviews.author: kellie taylor

customer_reviews.title: Not as great as the one my physical therapy have
customer_reviews.text: It’s great to sit on but most of the Exercise that I do with these at work deflates and does not give me the range. I does give me decent night to my desk so I would give it a 4 star on it being a great chair if that is what it was bought for. Plus you have to have a Facebook account or download messenger in order to review your exercise guide that’s not included but taken with your phone on a QR code for Facebook.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Exercise Ball Chair - 55cm / 65cm / 75cm Yoga Fitness Pilates Ball & Stability Base for Home Gym & Office - Resistance Bands, Workout Poster & Pump. Improve Balance, Core Strength & Posture
feature_bullets: ✅ WATCH OUR VIDEO! Scroll down & watch 'How To Set Up & Use The Mantra Sports BodyBall' & see why our swiss ball is recommended by physios, personal trainers & physical therapists to support flexibility, recovery & rehabilitation from knee or hip joint replacement surgery through low impact exercises.

✅ SAVE MONEY ON GYM FEES! Why spend money on the gym? This multi-purpose home gym system has all the equipment you need to support your fitness goals. Whether it’s Pilates, Yoga, CrossFit or a full body workout, you can burn fat & tone all muscle groups with the professional grade ball, attachable resistance straps & the glossy A1 size exercise wall poster.

✅ GET FIT WHILST YOU SIT! The perfect replacement for that office chair you spend hours on at your work desk. Take the opportunity to make a simple life change & improve your spinal health, build core strength to support your lower back, reduce pain & improve your posture.

✅ INDEPENDENTLY TESTED FOR TOTAL CONFIDENCE! Made of multi-layer heavy duty PVC, our core ball has been independently quality tested to bear loads up to 750lbs & is anti-burst & anti-slip. The stability base ensures reduced movement of the ball, crucial for perfect form when working out.

✅ 100% ULTIMATE SATISFACTION LIFETIME GUARANTEE! Buy from Mantra Sports and you're also backed by our legendary customer service – just see our reviews! If for any reason you don't absolutely love your Mantra Sports Body Ball Gym Series, simply contact us and we will do whatever it takes to make it right!

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
